```{r}

```

```{r}
sun_ts <- ts(sunspot_month$Sunspots, start = c(1749, 1),frequency=12)
plot(sun_ts, main = "Sunspot Bulanan", ylab = "Jumlah", col="maroon")
```
```{r}
sun_decomp <- decompose(sun_ts)
plot(sun_decomp)
```

